S.FORM: u tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal (congtung) ayza sa ci Khaltmaagiin Battulga (Haletema Patetuleka ), 1963 a mihca 3 a bulad 3 a demiad nalecuhan. u tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal (congtung) nu Mongolia ayza, micakat a demiad sa i 2017 a mihca 7 bulad 10 demiad. malalitin tu ihekalay atu zumaay a natinengan List of current heads of state and government Khaltmaagiin Battulga
